name: Beijing Forum - Islamabad
about: A mobile app for Beijing Forum - Islamabad attendees to provide them with up-to-date information about the conference.
tagline: Project was completed as part of IT team in the Student OC of the conference.

features.heading: The project was completed on May 13, 2016.
features.subheading: Beijing Forum is an annual academic event hosted by Peking University in Beijing. In 2016, National University of Sciences and Technology (NUST) in Islamabad, Pakistan inaugurated the Beijing Forum Overseas Series.

list.name: Conference Location
list.about: Locations related to conference marked on a map (using Google Maps API).

list.name: News Updates
list.about: News updates received from a backend server in realtime (when application running) and displayed on a notice-board inside the application.

list.name: Information/Schedule
list.about: Details of the event, including information and schedule of the conference.
